page.syntax: Label_Name as C = LABEL.preview(C layoutname [,C filter [,C order [,L modal [,L session_modal [,* arguments [,* options ]]]]]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of the label to preview.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

item.name: .T. = The user cannot change focus without closing the dialog.
.F. = The user can change focus without closing the dialog.

.T. = This means that any script that calls the LABEL.PREVIEW() method will pause until the Print Preview window is closed. However, the preview window itself is not a modal dialog box. The user is free to select other windows in Alpha Anywhere.
.F. = The script does not pause until the Print Preview window is closed.

page.discussion: The Label.PREVIEW() method displays the Preview dialog box showing the selected label.
